link.title: CC Insider

feed.tagline: Welcome to the land of the comedy-obsessed -- where the comedian is king, the funny news and features are served all day, and Comedy Central shows and content are unabashedly celebrated.

info.div: This is an Atom formatted XML site feed. It is intended to be viewed in a Newsreader or syndicated to another site. Please visit CC Insider for more info.
